name: Horror Gate AR
description: Horror Gate Augmented Reality is one of the most terrifying and realistic Horror Games on the market. Be prepared to see some of the scariest demons, monsters, spirits and constant jumps scares. The game sees you open a door to hell for 60 seconds. During this time a string of virtual reality demons, spirits and monsters will enter your house. you must find them and banish them back to hell. Get a group of your friends to play this at night, let the monsters enter your living room/bedroom with just a few lamps on and you will be guaranteed to scream the house down - can you handle to it!
